title: Stralsund
summary: Stralsund (German pronunciation: [ˈʃtʁaːlzʊnt] (listen); Swedish: Strålsund),[3] officially the Hanseatic City of Stralsund (German: Hansestadt Stralsund), is a city in the Pomeranian part of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany. It is located at the southern coast of the Strelasund, a sound of the Baltic Sea separating the island of Rügen from the mainland.[4]
